Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.control.state

Class State

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.control.state.State
public class State extends Object
This class encapsulates all the possible states of the game.

    • updateEndState

      public boolean updateEndState(com.google.gson.JsonObject o)
      Updates the game's end state.
      Parameters:
      o - the JsonObject corresponding to a end message from the server (it is assumed to be correct)
      Returns:
      true if the application has to be shut down, false otherwise
